title: No permission shall be required for, installation of Solar Panels having base of solar panel at height 1
clause_text: No permission shall be required for, installation of Solar Panels having base of solar panel at height 1.8m from terrace, ensuring structural stability from the Licensed Structural Engineer.

source_pdf.text_snippet: No permission shall be required for, installation of Solar Panels having base of solar panel at height 1.8m from terrace, ensuring structural stability from the Licensed Structural Engineer.
